languages.text: Безжизненный кусок камня покрыт россыпью кратеров, образовавшихся вследствие частых столкновений с более мелкими небесными телами, метеорами. Команда затаила дыхание — решится ли Вольный Торговец испытать новые орудия на одиноком астероиде?

traits.locale_text: Безжизненный кусок камня покрыт россыпью кратеров, образовавшихся вследствие частых столкновений с более мелкими небесными телами, метеорами. Команда затаила дыхание — решится ли Вольный Торговец испытать новые орудия на одиноком астероиде?

languages.text: Craters are scattered all over the lifeless rock, marking frequent collisions with smaller celestial bodies such as meteorites. The crew hold their breath. Will the Rogue Trader do it? Will {mf|he|she} test the new cannons on the lone asteroid?
languages.original_text: Безжизненный кусок камня покрыт россыпью кратеров, образовавшихся вследствие частых столкновений с более мелкими небесными телами, метеорами. Команда затаила дыхание — решится ли Вольный Торговец испытать новые орудия на одиноком астероиде?

traits.locale_text: Craters are scattered all over the lifeless rock, marks left by frequent impacts of smaller rocks, known as meteors. The crew are holding their breath. Will the Rogue Trader do it? Will {mf|he|she} test the new cannons on the lone asteroid?

Craters are scattered all over the lifeless rock, marks left by frequent impacts of smaller rocks, known as meteors. The crew are holding their breath. Will the Rogue Trader do it? Will {mf|he|she} test the new cannons on the lone asteroid?

Craters are scattered all over the lifeless rock, marks left by the frequent impacts of smaller celestial bodies, meteorites. The crew are holding their breath. Will the Rogue Trader do it? Will {mf|he|she} test the new cannons on the lone asteroid?

Craters are scattered all over the lifeless rock, marking frequent collisions with smaller celestial bodies such as meteorites. The crew hold their breath. Will the Rogue Trader do it? Will {mf|he|she} test the new cannons on the lone asteroid?

Craters are scattered all over the lifeless rock, marking frequent collisions with smaller celestial bodies such as meteorites. The crew hold their breath. Will the Rogue Trader do it? Will {mf|he|she} test the new cannons on the lone asteroid?

Craters are scattered all over the lifeless rock, marking frequent collisions with smaller celestial bodies such as meteorites. The crew hold their breath. Will the Rogue Trader do it? Will {mf|he|she} test the new cannons on the lone asteroid?

languages.text: 这块荒芜的岩地上布满了陨石坑。看来，无数陨石之类的小型天体曾与这颗小行星发生过碰撞。船员们屏住了呼吸：行商浪人真的要这么做了吗？{mf|他|她}真的要用这颗死寂的小行星测试新的宏炮吗？
languages.original_text: Craters are scattered all over the lifeless rock, marking frequent collisions with smaller celestial bodies such as meteorites. The crew hold their breath. Will the Rogue Trader do it? Will {mf|he|she} test the new cannons on the lone asteroid?

traits.locale_text: 这块荒芜的岩地上布满了陨石坑。看来，无数陨石之类的小型天体曾与这颗小行星发生过碰撞。船员们屏住了呼吸：行商浪人真的要这么做了吗？{mf|他|她}真的要用这颗死寂的小行星测试新的巨炮吗？

languages.text: La roca inerte está cubierta de cráteres, lo que indica colisiones frecuentes con cuerpos celestiales pequeños, como meteoritos. La tripulación aguanta la respiración. ¿Será este el momento? ¿Probará {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente los nuevos cañones con el asteroide solitario?
languages.original_text: Craters are scattered all over the lifeless rock, marking frequent collisions with smaller celestial bodies such as meteorites. The crew hold their breath. Will the Rogue Trader do it? Will {mf|he|she} test the new cannons on the lone asteroid?

traits.locale_text: La roca inerte está cubierta de cráteres, lo que indica colisiones frecuentes con cuerpos celestiales pequeños, como meteoritos. La tripulación aguanta la respiración. ¿Será este el momento? ¿Probará {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente los nuevos cañones con el asteroide solitario?

languages.text: 隕石などの小さな天体が頻繁に衝突した跡が、クレーターとなって生命のいない岩場に点在している。クルーは息をのむ。ローグトレーダーはやるだろうか？この小惑星で新しいキャノン砲をテストするのだろうか？
languages.original_text: Craters are scattered all over the lifeless rock, marking frequent collisions with smaller celestial bodies such as meteorites. The crew hold their breath. Will the Rogue Trader do it? Will {mf|he|she} test the new cannons on the lone asteroid?

traits.locale_text: 隕石などの小さな天体が頻繁に衝突した跡が、クレーターとなって生命のいない岩場に点在している。クルーは息をのむ。ローグトレーダーはやるだろうか？この小惑星で新しいキャノン砲をテストするのだろうか？

languages.text: Der leblose Fels ist übersät mit Kratern, die auf regelmäßige Kollisionen mit kleineren Himmelskörpern wie Meteoriten hinweisen. Die Crew hält den Atem an. Wird {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} es wirklich tun? Wird {mf|er|sie} die neuen Kanonen an dem einsamen Asteroiden testen?
languages.original_text: Craters are scattered all over the lifeless rock, marking frequent collisions with smaller celestial bodies such as meteorites. The crew hold their breath. Will the Rogue Trader do it? Will {mf|he|she} test the new cannons on the lone asteroid?

traits.locale_text: Der leblose Fels ist übersät mit Kratern, die auf regelmäßige Kollisionen mit kleineren Himmelskörpern wie Meteoriten hinweisen. Die Crew hält den Atem an. Wird {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} es wirklich tun? Wird {mf|er|sie} die neuen Kanonen an dem einsamen Asteroiden testen?

languages.text: Des cratères sont éparpillés sur ce caillou sans vie et attestent de fréquentes collisions avec des corps célestes plus petits tels que des météorites. L'équipage retient son souffle. {mf|Le libre-marchand va-t-il|La libre-marchande va-t-elle} vraiment le faire ? {mf|Va-t-il|Va-t-elle} essayer les nouveaux canons sur cet astéroïde solitaire ?
languages.original_text: Craters are scattered all over the lifeless rock, marking frequent collisions with smaller celestial bodies such as meteorites. The crew hold their breath. Will the Rogue Trader do it? Will {mf|he|she} test the new cannons on the lone asteroid?

traits.locale_text: Des cratères sont éparpillés sur ce caillou sans vie et attestent de fréquentes collisions avec des corps célestes plus petits tels que des météorites. L'équipage retient son souffle. {mf|Le libre-marchand va-t-il|La libre-marchande va-t-elle} vraiment le faire ? {mf|Va-t-il|Va-t-elle} essayer les nouveaux canons sur cet astéroïde solitaire ?

languages.text: Meteorlar gibi daha küçük gök cisimleriyle sık sık yaşanan çarpışmaları işaret eden kraterler, cansız kaya parçasının her yerine dağılmış. Mürettebat nefeslerini tutuyor. Hür Tacir bunu yapacak mı? Lord Kaptan, yeni topları bir asteroitte deneyecek mi?
languages.original_text: Craters are scattered all over the lifeless rock, marking frequent collisions with smaller celestial bodies such as meteorites. The crew hold their breath. Will the Rogue Trader do it? Will {mf|he|she} test the new cannons on the lone asteroid?
